newsitem.title: USA: FCOJ futures finish up, market recoups losses.
newsitem.headline: FCOJ futures finish up, market recoups losses.

text.p: NYCE frozen concentrated orange juice futures regained some lost ground and closed higher, with the speculators noted as the day's main buyer, floor sources said.
The most-active January contract found support at its contract low of 99.00. Most of the deferred months also sunk to contract lows early, but closed firmer across the board.
January gained 2.05 on the day to settle at 110.00, ranged 101.50 to 99.00, a lifetime low. The deferred months ended 1.90 to 0.40 firmer.
The market awaits the Florida weekly movement data, released today.
